fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, lock someone's house. They become an invalid target for all abilities that night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the locked player is not Coven, they cannot perform their night ability that night unless it is Astral.
- With the Necronomicon, your ability becomes a night ability that just super-roleblocks your target, prevents all visitors to your target and deals a Basic attack to your target. You become roleblock immune.
- With the Necronomicon, you are immune to all fire- and bug-based attacks.
- If you target Chansey, the effect is permanent.
